hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT v FROM Version v WHERE v.docId = ?1 AND v.no = ?2
SELECT v FROM Version v WHERE v.docId = ?1 ORDER BY v.no
SELECT v FROM Version v WHERE v.id = ( SELECT max(v.id) FROM Version v WHERE v.docId = ?1 )
SELECT v FROM Version v WHERE v.no = 0 AND v.docId = ?1
SELECT v FROM Meta m, Version v WHERE m.defaultVersionNo = v.no AND m.id = v.docId AND m.id = ?1
UPDATE Meta m SET m.defaultVersionNo = :defaultVersionNo, m.publisherId = :publisherId WHERE m.id = :docId
